title: Bonus Mystery Gift from baron steal
body: With Fnatic stealing Baron For SKT, triggering the Mystery Gift bonus that includes 2x chance of getting an Esports skin (Fnatic, TPA, SKT or SSW), championship and legendary skins. Does this include Championship Riven or is it just Thresh and Shyvanna?

replies.body: Championship Riven is NEVER available. Im sure once it is, you will no doubt hear about it from half the people saying "finally" and people who already own it saying "nooooo"
fair enough thanks for the clarification
